short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Always open links in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Due to Chrome's security permission restrictions, the current version requires manually adding domains to the whitelist. It supports real-time editing in the text box as well as import and export functions. The changes will take effect after refreshing the opened webpage.
